Container.Name: Idle-Miner-Dashboard
Container.Overview: Idle Miner lets you remotely control your mining rigs as well as setting up smart rules. This component is a dashboard that lets you control all of your rigs from one place.
Container.DonateText: We develop all of our apps in our spare time so if you feel like supporting us please donate
Container.Description: Idle Miner lets you remotely control your mining rigs as well as setting up smart rules. This component is a dashboard that lets you control all of your rigs from one place.
